get.description: Get all SIM cards belonging to the user that match the given filters.

parameters.name: filter[tags]
parameters.description:
A list of SIM card tags to filter on.

If the SIM card contains all of the given tags they will be found.

For example, if the SIM cards have the following tags:
  • ['customers', 'staff', 'test']
  • ['test']
  • ['customers']
Searching for ['customers', 'test'] returns only the first because it's the only one with both tags.
Searching for test returns the first two SIMs, because both of them have such tag.
Searching for customers returns the first and last SIMs.

parameters.name: filter[iccid]
parameters.description: A search string to partially match for the SIM card's ICCID.

parameters.name: filter[status]
parameters.description: Filter by a SIM card's status.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorts SIM cards by the given field. Defaults to ascending order unless field is prefixed with a minus sign.
